events.name: EV battery supply chain
events.wd_description: The EV battery supply chain involves the production and supply of critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel to meet the increasing demand for EV batteries and clean energy technologies.
events.description: The EV battery supply chain involves the production and supply of critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel to meet the increasing demand for EV batteries and clean energy technologies.

events.name: Critical materials demand
events.wd_description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel is driven by the increasing production of EV batteries and clean energy technologies.
events.description: The demand for critical materials such as lithium, cobalt, and nickel is driven by the increasing production of EV batteries and clean energy technologies.

events.name: hium demand
events.wd_description: In 2022, lithium demand exceeded supply despite a significant increase in production since 2017.
events.description: In 2022, lithium demand exceeded supply despite a significant increase in production since 2017.

events.name: alt demand
events.wd_description: In 2022, 30% of cobalt demand was for EV batteries, reflecting a significant increase from 2017.
events.description: In 2022, 30% of cobalt demand was for EV batteries, reflecting a significant increase from 2017.

events.name: kel demand
events.wd_description: In 2022, 10% of nickel demand was for EV batteries, showing a notable rise from 2017.
events.description: In 2022, 10% of nickel demand was for EV batteries, showing a notable rise from 2017.

events.name: Battery chemistry developments
events.wd_description: Developments in battery chemistry have been influenced by the price and availability of critical minerals, leading to shifts towards lower-cobalt and lower-nickel ratios.
events.description: Developments in battery chemistry have been influenced by the price and availability of critical minerals, leading to shifts towards lower-cobalt and lower-nickel ratios.

events.name: chemistries
events.wd_description: NMC chemistries have evolved from equal ratios of nickel, manganese, and cobalt (NMC333) to lower-cobalt ratios like NMC622 and NMC811.
events.description: NMC chemistries have evolved from equal ratios of nickel, manganese, and cobalt (NMC333) to lower-cobalt ratios like NMC622 and NMC811.

events.name: chemistries
events.wd_description: LFP chemistries, which are less reliant on nickel and cobalt, have gained popularity due to their lower cost despite their lower energy density.
events.description: LFP chemistries, which are less reliant on nickel and cobalt, have gained popularity due to their lower cost despite their lower energy density.

events.name: Price trends of battery materials
events.wd_description: The prices of lithium, nickel, and cobalt have shown significant variability, affecting the cost and development of different battery chemistries.
events.description: The prices of lithium, nickel, and cobalt have shown significant variability, affecting the cost and development of different battery chemistries.

events.name: hium price trends
events.wd_description: Lithium prices have increased significantly over the past two years, peaking at six times their 2015-2020 average by early 2023, but have since dropped by 20% between January and March 2023.
events.description: Lithium prices have increased significantly over the past two years, peaking at six times their 2015-2020 average by early 2023, but have since dropped by 20% between January and March 2023.

events.name: kel price trends
events.wd_description: Nickel prices increased sharply in 2022, peaking at twice the 2015-2020 average.
events.description: Nickel prices increased sharply in 2022, peaking at twice the 2015-2020 average.

events.name: alt price trends
events.wd_description: Cobalt prices increased due to high demand for EV batteries and concerns about mining practices.
events.description: Cobalt prices increased due to high demand for EV batteries and concerns about mining practices.

events.name: ganese price trends
events.wd_description: Manganese prices have remained relatively stable compared to other critical minerals.
events.description: Manganese prices have remained relatively stable compared to other critical minerals.

events.name: Impact on battery prices
events.wd_description: Increased prices of battery materials affected various battery chemistries differently, with LFP batteries experiencing the highest price increase.
events.description: Increased prices of battery materials affected various battery chemistries differently, with LFP batteries experiencing the highest price increase.

events.name: battery prices
events.wd_description: LFP battery prices increased by over 25% in 2022 due to the higher rate of lithium price increase.
events.description: LFP battery prices increased by over 25% in 2022 due to the higher rate of lithium price increase.

events.name: battery prices
events.wd_description: NMC battery prices increased by less than 15% in 2022 due to the relatively lower rate of price increase for nickel and cobalt compared to lithium.
events.description: NMC battery prices increased by less than 15% in 2022 due to the relatively lower rate of price increase for nickel and cobalt compared to lithium.

events.name: Supply chain sustainability and innovation
events.wd_description: Ensuring supply chain sustainability, resilience, and security is critical. Innovations in advanced battery technologies and measures to support optimized battery sizes and recycling are essential.
events.description: Ensuring supply chain sustainability, resilience, and security is critical. Innovations in advanced battery technologies and measures to support optimized battery sizes and recycling are essential.

events.name: anced battery technologies
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technology that require smaller quantities of critical minerals can reduce supply chain vulnerabilities.
events.description: Innovations in battery technology that require smaller quantities of critical minerals can reduce supply chain vulnerabilities.

events.name: tery recycling
events.wd_description: Developing efficient battery recycling methods to recover valuable materials can help mitigate supply constraints.
events.description: Developing efficient battery recycling methods to recover valuable materials can help mitigate supply constraints.

events.name: imized battery sizes
events.wd_description: Promoting the uptake of vehicle models with optimized battery sizes can enhance material efficiency and reduce overall demand.
events.description: Promoting the uptake of vehicle models with optimized battery sizes can enhance material efficiency and reduce overall demand.

events.name: Future outlook and trends
events.wd_description: The future of the EV battery supply chain will be shaped by continued demand growth, material price fluctuations, and advancements in technology and recycling.
events.description: The future of the EV battery supply chain will be shaped by continued demand growth, material price fluctuations, and advancements in technology and recycling.

events.name: and growth
events.wd_description: The continued growth in demand for EVs and clean energy technologies will drive the need for critical materials.
events.description: The continued growth in demand for EVs and clean energy technologies will drive the need for critical materials.

events.name: erial price trends
events.wd_description: Material prices will continue to fluctuate based on supply-demand dynamics and market conditions.
events.description: Material prices will continue to fluctuate based on supply-demand dynamics and market conditions.

events.name: hnological advancements
events.wd_description: Ongoing technological advancements will help improve battery efficiency and reduce reliance on critical materials.
events.description: Ongoing technological advancements will help improve battery efficiency and reduce reliance on critical materials.

events.name: ycling improvements
events.wd_description: Enhancing recycling processes will be crucial for material recovery and sustainability.
events.description: Enhancing recycling processes will be crucial for material recovery and sustainability.

events.name: Evolution of Battery Chemistry
events.wd_description: Developments in battery chemistry over recent years have been driven by changes in the price and availability of critical minerals, leading to shifts in the composition and manufacturing of batteries.
events.description: Developments in battery chemistry over recent years have been driven by changes in the price and availability of critical minerals, leading to shifts in the composition and manufacturing of batteries.

events.name: Early NMC chemistries
events.wd_description: Initially, NMC chemistries using equal ratios of nickel, manganese, and cobalt (NMC333 or NMC111) were popular until 2015.
events.description: Initially, NMC chemistries using equal ratios of nickel, manganese, and cobalt (NMC333 or NMC111) were popular until 2015.

events.name: Shift to lower-cobalt ratios
events.wd_description: Due to increasing cobalt prices and concerns about cobalt mining, battery chemistry shifted towards lower-cobalt ratios such as NMC622 and NMC811.
events.description: Due to increasing cobalt prices and concerns about cobalt mining, battery chemistry shifted towards lower-cobalt ratios such as NMC622 and NMC811.

events.wd_description: NMC622 chemistry uses a 6:2:2 ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt.
events.description: NMC622 chemistry uses a 6:2:2 ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt.

events.wd_description: NMC811 chemistry uses an 8:1:1 ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt, making it more difficult to manufacture but reducing cobalt dependency.
events.description: NMC811 chemistry uses an 8:1:1 ratio of nickel, manganese, and cobalt, making it more difficult to manufacture but reducing cobalt dependency.

events.name: Rise of LFP chemistries
events.wd_description: LFP chemistries, which do not rely on nickel and cobalt, have become more popular due to their cost advantages despite having lower energy density.
events.description: LFP chemistries, which do not rely on nickel and cobalt, have become more popular due to their cost advantages despite having lower energy density.

events.name: Impact of Material Prices on Battery Costs
events.wd_label: Impact of Material Prices on Battery Costs
events.wd_description: The variability in prices of critical materials such as lithium, nickel, and cobalt has led to differences in the cost increase of various battery chemistries.
events.description: The variability in prices of critical materials such as lithium, nickel, and cobalt has led to differences in the cost increase of various battery chemistries.

events.name: Lithium price impact
events.wd_description: The sharp increase in lithium prices over the past two years has had a significant impact on the cost of LFP batteries.
events.description: The sharp increase in lithium prices over the past two years has had a significant impact on the cost of LFP batteries.

events.name: Nickel price impact
events.wd_description: Nickel prices, which peaked in 2022, have influenced the cost of nickel-based chemistries like NMC.
events.description: Nickel prices, which peaked in 2022, have influenced the cost of nickel-based chemistries like NMC.

events.name: Cobalt price impact
events.wd_description: Rising cobalt prices have pushed battery manufacturers to develop chemistries with lower cobalt content.
events.description: Rising cobalt prices have pushed battery manufacturers to develop chemistries with lower cobalt content.

events.name: Future Trends in Battery Material Supply and Demand
events.wd_label: Future Trends in Battery Material Supply and Demand
events.wd_description: Future trends in the supply and demand of battery materials will be shaped by production capacity, technological advancements, and market dynamics.
events.description: Future trends in the supply and demand of battery materials will be shaped by production capacity, technological advancements, and market dynamics.

events.name: Increased production capacity
events.wd_description: An expected 40% increase in lithium supply by early 2023 is projected to impact battery material prices.
events.description: An expected 40% increase in lithium supply by early 2023 is projected to impact battery material prices.

events.name: Technological advancements
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technology and recycling are essential for meeting future demand and ensuring supply chain resilience.
events.description: Innovations in battery technology and recycling are essential for meeting future demand and ensuring supply chain resilience.

events.name: Market dynamics
events.wd_description: Fluctuations in demand for EVs, particularly in key markets like China, will influence the future supply and demand balance of critical materials.
events.description: Fluctuations in demand for EVs, particularly in key markets like China, will influence the future supply and demand balance of critical materials.

events.name: market trends
events.wd_description: Trends in the electric vehicle market, especially in major markets like China, affect the overall demand for battery materials.
events.description: Trends in the electric vehicle market, especially in major markets like China, affect the overall demand for battery materials.

events.name: bal supply chain factors
events.wd_description: Global supply chain dynamics, including trade policies and production capacities, play a significant role in determining the availability and prices of critical battery materials.
events.description: Global supply chain dynamics, including trade policies and production capacities, play a significant role in determining the availability and prices of critical battery materials.

events.name: Battery Recycling Developments
events.wd_description: Battery recycling is becoming increasingly important to recover valuable materials and ensure a sustainable supply chain for EV batteries.
events.description: Battery recycling is becoming increasingly important to recover valuable materials and ensure a sustainable supply chain for EV batteries.

events.name: Recycling technologies
events.wd_description: Advances in recycling technologies aim to efficiently recover valuable materials from used batteries.
events.description: Advances in recycling technologies aim to efficiently recover valuable materials from used batteries.

events.name: hanical recycling
events.wd_description: Mechanical recycling involves physically breaking down batteries to recover materials.
events.description: Mechanical recycling involves physically breaking down batteries to recover materials.

events.name: mical recycling
events.wd_description: Chemical recycling uses chemical processes to extract valuable materials from battery components.
events.description: Chemical recycling uses chemical processes to extract valuable materials from battery components.

events.name: logical recycling
events.wd_description: Biological recycling employs biological agents to recover metals from batteries.
events.description: Biological recycling employs biological agents to recover metals from batteries.

events.name: Policy support
events.wd_description: Government policies and regulations play a crucial role in promoting battery recycling and ensuring its economic viability.
events.description: Government policies and regulations play a crucial role in promoting battery recycling and ensuring its economic viability.

events.name: islation
events.wd_description: Laws and regulations are established to mandate and support battery recycling practices.
events.description: Laws and regulations are established to mandate and support battery recycling practices.

events.name: entives
events.wd_description: Financial and other incentives are provided to encourage recycling activities and investments.
events.description: Financial and other incentives are provided to encourage recycling activities and investments.

events.name: Economic factors
events.wd_description: The economic viability of recycling is influenced by the costs and benefits associated with recovering valuable materials.
events.description: The economic viability of recycling is influenced by the costs and benefits associated with recovering valuable materials.

events.name: ket prices
events.wd_description: The prices of recovered materials in the market impact the economic feasibility of recycling processes.
events.description: The prices of recovered materials in the market impact the economic feasibility of recycling processes.

events.name: overy costs
events.wd_description: The costs associated with recovering materials from used batteries affect the overall economic viability of recycling.
events.description: The costs associated with recovering materials from used batteries affect the overall economic viability of recycling.

events.name: Battery Innovation and Sustainability
events.wd_description: Innovations in battery technologies are crucial for sustainability, reducing reliance on critical materials, and improving overall efficiency.
events.description: Innovations in battery technologies are crucial for sustainability, reducing reliance on critical materials, and improving overall efficiency.

events.name: Advanced materials
events.wd_description: Development of advanced materials to reduce reliance on critical minerals and improve battery performance.
events.description: Development of advanced materials to reduce reliance on critical minerals and improve battery performance.

events.name: h-capacity materials
events.wd_description: Materials designed to increase the energy capacity of batteries, enhancing their performance and lifespan.
events.description: Materials designed to increase the energy capacity of batteries, enhancing their performance and lifespan.

events.name: ernative materials
events.wd_description: Research into materials that can replace or reduce the need for critical minerals in battery production.
events.description: Research into materials that can replace or reduce the need for critical minerals in battery production.

events.name: Sustainable practices
events.wd_description: Implementing sustainable practices throughout the battery lifecycle to reduce environmental impact.
events.description: Implementing sustainable practices throughout the battery lifecycle to reduce environmental impact.

events.name: -friendly manufacturing
events.wd_description: Manufacturing processes designed to minimize environmental impact and reduce resource consumption.
events.description: Manufacturing processes designed to minimize environmental impact and reduce resource consumption.

events.name: ycling integration
events.wd_description: Incorporating recycling processes into the battery lifecycle to recover materials and reduce waste.
events.description: Incorporating recycling processes into the battery lifecycle to recover materials and reduce waste.

events.name: Energy efficiency
events.wd_description: Enhancing the energy efficiency of batteries to improve performance and reduce the need for frequent recharging.
events.description: Enhancing the energy efficiency of batteries to improve performance and reduce the need for frequent recharging.

events.name: h-efficiency designs
events.wd_description: Designing batteries with high efficiency to maximize energy output and longevity.
events.description: Designing batteries with high efficiency to maximize energy output and longevity.

events.name: rgy density improvements

events.name: Manganese demand
events.description: This event captures the demand for manganese, which has had relatively stable prices compared to other critical materials.
